00156 void HelpMessage()
00157 {
00158         printf("Default connection is to localhost:9090.\n");
00159         printf("To specify another host, use: \n");
00160         printf("\t ./online-display -H hostname -p port\n");
00161         printf("Or, to open a ROOT file:\n");
00162         printf("\t ./online-display -i filename\n");
